article_title: Enhancements make EIN Finder an even better prospecting tool
article_text:
The EIN Finder allows you to find companies by Employee Identification Number (EIN), or else to search your market for businesses that have been assigned these numbers.

EIN Finder now includes not only business names and addresses but also many more business phone numbers. Other enhanced features include:
